N = int(input())
A = list(map(int, input().split()))
B = list(map(int, input().split()))
C = list(map(int, input().split()))

A.sort()
B.sort()
C.sort()

count = 0

for b in B:
    count += bisect_left(A, b) * (N - bisect_right(C, b))

print(count)

N = int(input())

A = list(map(int, input().split()))
B = list(map(int, input().split()))
C = list(map(int, input().split()))

A.sort()
B.sort()
C.sort()

ans = 0

for i in range(N):
    a = bisect_left(B, A[i] + 1)
    c = bisect_left(C, B[i] + 1)
    ans += a * c

print(ans)
